Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.wal

Class LazyInitializedWALProvider

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.wal.LazyInitializedWALProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
@Private class LazyInitializedWALProvider extends Object implements Closeable
A lazy initialized WAL provider for holding the WALProvider for some special tables, such as hbase:meta, hbase:replication, etc.
